text: Awubaboni yini labo ababenqatshelwe umhlangano wangasese bese bebuyela kuloko ababenqatshelwe kukona bese behlangana ndawonye ngesono nobutha kanye nokungasihloniphi isithunywa, futhi uma befika kuwena bakubingelela ngaloko angakubingeleli ngako uMvelinqangi futhi bathi emiphefumulweni yabo, “kungani engasijezisi uMvelinqangi ngaloko esikushoyo?” sibanele isihogo bayosha kusona kubi lapho kuyiwa khona
